content: विष् {vI.v} {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> (वेवेष्टि, वेविष्टे, --विष्ट) {@--1@} To surround. {@--2@} To spread through, extend, pervade. {@--3@} To embrace. {@--4@} To accomplish, effect, perform. {@--5@} To eat. {@--6@} To go to, go against, encounter; (not generally used in classical literature). {vII.v} {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> ( विष्णाति) To separate, disjoin. {vIII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (वेषति) To sprinkle, pour out.
विष् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Feces, excrement, ordure. {@--2@} Spreading, diffusion. {@--3@} A girl, as in विट्पति.
